CIAttributeDescription: Creates a concave or convex bump that originates at a specified point in the image.

inputImage.CIAttributeDescription: The image to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this is the foreground image.

inputScale.CIAttributeDescription: The scale of the effect determines the curvature of the bump. A value of 0.0 has no effect. Positive values create an outward bump; negative values create an inward bump.

inputRadius.CIAttributeDescription: The radius determines how many pixels are used to create the distortion. The larger the radius, wider the extent of the distortion.

inputCenter.CIAttributeDescription: The x and y position to use as the center of the bump.
